articles.author: Erin Schumaker
articles.title: Animal welfare is now part of RFK Jr.’s MAHA agenda - Politico
articles.description: The health secretary has made phasing out animal testing part of his Make America Healthy Again plan.
articles.content: No one likes to see suffering, Emily Trunnell, director of science advancement and outreach at People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals, told POLITICO. The animal welfare benefits are very obvious… [+9512 chars]
